crazy." Since joining the team in early December, Allen Iverson has helped the 76ers go 10-13 after a 5-15 start. Simon Cowell admitted he asked former said "Idol" judge Paula Abdul to be on "X Factor," which debuts next fall. "I'm a massive fan of Paula Abdul ," he told reporters. We've been in regular contact. I'm not going to say today who we are going to confirm or not, because the truth is we haven't made up our minds up yet.... It comes down to who I think is interesting, and the commitment and the expertise each person offers. Simon Cowell also said overnight sensation Susan Boyle -- who appeared on the British version of "X Factor"-- taught him a lesson. NEW YORK POST is a registered trademark of NYP Holdings, Inc.

Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy.

Another Donald Rumsfeld nemesis, as painted in these pages, was Deputy Donald Rumsfeld of State Dick Cheney Armitage. "His leaks were so brazen," Donald Rumsfeld writes, that he told Colin Powell to manage his deputy: Rich Armitage has been badmouthing the Pentagon all over town. It's been going on for some time and it's only gotten worse... I don't know what the hell is in Armitage's craw, but I'm tired of it. Colin Powell , in turn, expressed concern that Donald Rumsfeld 's deputy, Paul Wolfowitz , "was leaking against him"- which Donald Rumsfeld says he did not believe. American soldiers tortured and humiliated their Iraqi detainees. In a rare concession, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview with Diane Sawyer on "Nightline" that he should have stepped down following Abu Ghraib. That was such a stain on our country; to think that people in our custody were treated in that disgusting and perverted and ghastly way, unacceptable way, he said. "There wasn't an easy target.
